extendedIngredients.name: brandy
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 teaspoons Applejack Brandy (I used 1 T. of Finger Lakes Distilling Maplejack)
metaInformation: (I used 1 T. of Finger Lakes Distilling Maplejack)

extendedIngredients.name: extra sharp cheddar cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: 10 ounces of Adams Reserve New York Extra Sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded

extendedIngredients.name: lowfat cream cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: 8 ounces cream cheese, or lowfat (NOT nonfat) cream cheese, softened

extendedIngredients.name: pecans
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 cup Trader Joes Sweet and Spicy Pecans (substitute 1 c. pecans, 1 t. Cracker and apple slices to serve

title: Sweet & Spicy White Cheddar Cheese Ball W/apples & Bacon

winePairing.pairingText: Sparkling rosÃ© and Sparkling Wine are my top picks for Appetizer. If you're serving a selection of appetizers, you can't go wrong with these. Both are very food friendly and complement a variety of flavors. The Bellissima Sparkling rosÃ© with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 24 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Bellissima Sparkling Rose
productMatches.description: This is an elegant, bright rosÃ©, with hints of strawberry and grapefruit, and a soft, persistent foam. Uncorked at the very last minute, Bellissima Sparkling RosÃ© pairs perfectly with smoked salmon, shellfish, and seafood hor dâ€™oeuvres such as tuna tartare, sushi, and sashimi.

instructions:
1. Put apple slices in small dish and sprinkle with brandy and maple syrup while you prep the rest of the recipe. Fry bacon in large skillet, turning frequently, until crisp, then set aside on a paper towel lined plate.
  2. Finely chop apples.
  3. Combine cream cheese, Adams Reserve New York Extra Sharp Cheddar, cayenne pepper, and apples in food processor. Pulse until mixture is throughly mixed and combined.
  4. Combine pecans, brown sugar, and cooled, crumbled bacon in mini-food processor (or wash out regular processor and dry) until finely chopped.
  5. Use spatula to remove cheese mixture to a cutting board. Lightly wet hands and roll the cheese into a ball. Roll in the bacon pecan mixture and pat to coat.
  6. Arrange on serving platter with crackers and apple slices dipped in lemon juice/water. Enjoy!

steps.step: Put apple slices in small dish and sprinkle with brandy and maple syrup while you prep the rest of the recipe. Fry bacon in large skillet, turning frequently, until crisp, then set aside on a paper towel lined plate.Finely chop apples.
Combine cream cheese, Adams Reserve New York Extra Sharp Cheddar, cayenne pepper, and apples in food processor. Pulse until mixture is throughly mixed and combined.

Combine pecans, brown sugar, and cooled, crumbled bacon in mini-food processor (or wash out regular processor and dry) until finely chopped.Use spatula to remove cheese mixture to a cutting board. Lightly wet hands and roll the cheese into a ball.
Roll in the bacon pecan mixture and pat to coat.Arrange on serving platter with crackers and apple slices dipped in lemon juice/water. Enjoy!
